The speech of the President of the Republic in minutes
My condolences to all the Egyptians for our sad suffering in the lives that have been lost from the Egyptian people, civilians and police
I would like to express my condolences to the courageous people of Suez who led the struggle of the Egyptians and who taught the world a lot of patriotism and sacrifice
The right of the citizen to freedom is inseparable from his right to security and security
Protecting the homeland is the responsibility of all and we will confront any threat to its security with force and resolve the president
I would like to thank the police for their efforts in defending the citizens and state institutions, and they continue to do so
I follow the legal procedures hour by hour to set the criminals and hold them accountable # President
Let everyone know that all the institutions of this nation are capable of protecting their citizens
I promised you not to take extraordinary measures, but if I had to, I am doing the # president
Announced a state of emergency for thirty days in the provinces of Ismailia, Suez and Port Said # President
The curfew was announced in the governorates of Ismailia, Suez and Port Said from 9 pm to 6 am
I call for dialogue for all parties and national forces and will issue a detailed presidential statement tonight
